```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(reshape2)
library(lubridate)
library(forcats)
```


```{r}
wdw_metadata_2019 <- wdw_metadata %>%
  filter(year(as.Date(ymd(DATE))) == 2019)
wdw_metadata_2019

seasons <- c("WINTER", "MARTIN LUTHER KING JUNIOR DAY", "PRESIDENTS WEEK", "SPRING", "MARDI GRAS", "EASTER", "MEMORIAL DAY", "SUMMER BREAK",
             "JULY 4TH", "SEPTEMBER LOW", "FALL", "COLUMBUS DAY", "HALLOWEEN", "JERSEY WEEK", "THANKSGIVING", "CHRISTMAS", "CHRISTMAS PEAK")
```


```{r}
wdw_metadata_2019 %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = HOLIDAYPX))
```


```{r}
wdw_metadata_2019 %>%
  group_by(SEASON) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(y = ordered(SEASON, levels = rev(seasons)), fill = as.factor(HOLIDAYPX)))
```
